original: intros. intro H. destruct H. - exists nil. split; [|split]. + apply H1. + apply H0. + left. reflexivity. - destruct H as [l1 [Hlt [Hplus Heq]]]. exists (pX A n b q). split. + apply Hlt. + split. * apply mainu2a with (a1:=a) (a2:=b) (l1:=p) (l2:=l1) (l3:=l). apply Hplus. apply os. intro abs. apply H0. apply heq. split;[|easy]. subst. apply zeroP_plusTermr in Heq. destruct Heq. apply abs. * right. split;[|split]. apply H1. apply Hplus. reflexivity.
